騲字的基本解释

騲
cǎo
同“草”⑦。

騲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cǎo］
［《廣韻》采老切，上晧，清。］
雌马。

騲字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　騲； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1443第01
【廣韻】采老切【集韻】采早切，?音草。【玉篇】牝畜之通稱。【正字通】本作草。晉郭欽謂魏杜畿課民畜牸牛草馬。【顏氏家訓】詩魯頌，駉駉牡馬。江南本皆作牝牡之牡，河北悉爲放牧之牧。鄴下博士見難云：駉頌旣美僖公牧于坰野之事，何限騲騭乎。余答云：按《毛詩》駉駉良馬，腹幹肥張也。若作放牧之意，通於牝牡，則不容限在良馬，獨得駉駉之稱，良馬諸侯以充朝聘，郊祀必無騲也。今以詩傳，良馬通於牧騲，恐失毛氏意。

考證：〔【正字通】本作草。晉郭欽謂魏杜畿課民畜㹀牛草馬。〕　謹照原文㹀牛改牸牛。原版已改。
騲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
騲字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【horse character department】　草; Kangxi strokes: 20; page number: page 1443 01
[Guangyun] Picking old cuts [Jiyun] Picking early cuts, sound grass. [Jade articles] Generic term for "rabbits". 【Zhengzitong】This is a cursive. Jin Guoqin said that Wei and Duji class folks, cattle, cattle and horses. [The Family Instructions of Yan Family] Poem Lu Song, 駉駉 stallion. Jiangnan is known as the mule, and Hebei is known as the grazing animal. Dr. Ye Xia sees a difficult question: What is the matter of Xing Songmin, Mei Xing, and herding in the wild, how limited is the grass. Yu Dayun: According to "Mao Shi", a good horse has a dry abdomen. If it is used for grazing, it is not limited to the good horse, and it is uniquely called the horse. The princes of the good horse will be employed by the court, and there will be no grass for the rites. Today, it is passed on by poems that good horses are connected to pastures, fearing to lose the meaning of Mao's clan. Textual research: [[Zhengzitong] This is a cursive. Jin Guoqin said that Wei Duji classed people and animals as cattle and grass horses. 〕 　I would like to follow the original 㹀 Niu changed to a niu. The original version has been changed.
